mapper.select: select '${TABLEID}' tableId, tableid colId, baseSecu from table(PK_BGT_SECU.f_Secu_Col('${appId}','${userId}','1','${TABLEID}','${agencyId}'))

select * from ( select (select t3.NAME from dict_t_model t3 where t3.tableid = t1.TABLEID) as tableName, t1.TABLEID, t1.BASESECU, t1.MANTYPE, t1.MANID, t1.colID, t2.NAME as columnName, t2.LEVELNO, t2.SUPERID, t2.ISLEAF, t2.ORDERID from secu_t_col t1, dict_t_factor t2 where t1.COLID = t2.COLUMNID and t1.TABLEID = #{tableId} and t1.MANID = #{roleId} and t1.MANTYPE = '1' union select (select t3.NAME from dict_t_model t3 where t3.tableid = t.TABLEID) as tableName, t.TABLEID, '3' as baseSecu, '1' as MANTYPE,+ #{roleId} as MANID, t.COLUMNID as colid, t.NAME as columnName, t.LEVELNO, t.SUPERID, T.ISLEAF, t.ORDERID from dict_t_factor t where t.TABLEID = #{tableId} and not exists (select * from secu_t_col t5 where t5.TABLEID = #{tableId} and t5.MANID = #{roleId} and t.COLUMNID = t5.COLID) ) CONNECT BY SUPERID = PRIOR colid start with superid='0' order SIBLINGS BY ORDERID
mapper.delete: delete from secu_t_col t where t.TABLEID=#{tableId} and t.MANID=#{roleId} and t.MANTYPE='1'
mapper.select: WITH T_USER_COL_ROLES AS (SELECT ROLEID, COLUMNID, B.TABLEID FROM SECU_T_USERROLE A, DICT_T_FACTOR B WHERE USERID = #{userID} AND B.TABLEID = #{tableID} AND B.ISLEAF = '1'), T_USER_TABLE_ROLES AS (SELECT ROLEID, #{tableID} TABLEID FROM SECU_T_USERROLE WHERE USERID = #{userID}), T_SECU_TABLE AS (SELECT TAB.BASESECU, TAB.EXTADD, TAB.EXTDEL, TAB.EXTUPDATE, TAB.TABLEID, TAB.MANID FROM SECU_T_TABLE TAB WHERE TAB.TABLEID = #{tableID} AND TAB.ISSUIT = '0' UNION ALL SELECT TAB.BASESECU, TAB.EXTADD, TAB.EXTDEL, TAB.EXTUPDATE, SUIT.TABLEID, TAB.MANID FROM SECU_T_TABLE TAB, (SELECT #{tableID} TABLEID, SUITID FROM DICT_T_SUIT START WITH SUITID = (SELECT SUITID FROM DICT_T_MODEL WHERE TABLEID = #{tableID}) CONNECT BY SUITID = PRIOR SUPERID) SUIT WHERE TAB.TABLEID = SUIT.SUITID AND TAB.ISSUIT = '1'), T_USER_SECU_TABLE AS (SELECT NVL(TAB.BASESECU, 3) BASESECU, T2.TABLEID, T2.ROLEID FROM T_SECU_TABLE TAB JOIN T_USER_TABLE_ROLES T2 ON TAB.MANID = T2.ROLEID AND TAB.TABLEID = T2.TABLEID), T_SECU_COL_TABLE AS (SELECT NVL(TAB.BASESECU, 3) BASESECU, RC.COLUMNID, RC.TABLEID, RC.ROLEID FROM SECU_T_COL TAB RIGHT JOIN T_USER_COL_ROLES RC ON TAB.MANID = RC.ROLEID AND TAB.COLID = RC.COLUMNID) SELECT MAX(BASESECU) BASESECU, COLUMNID COLID, #{tableID} TABLEID FROM (SELECT LEAST(TSC.BASESECU, UST.BASESECU) BASESECU, TSC.COLUMNID FROM T_SECU_COL_TABLE TSC, T_USER_SECU_TABLE UST WHERE TSC.TABLEID = UST.TABLEID AND TSC.ROLEID = UST.ROLEID) GROUP BY COLUMNID
